SimpleDataListSpec.Name: MIMED Batch Simple Data List for Sub-Departments
SimpleDataListSpec.Description: MIMED Batch Simple Data List for Sub-Departments
SimpleDataListSpec.Author: UM Dev

SPSimpleList.c:CreateProcedureSQL: create procedure dbo.USR_USP_SIMPLEDATALIST_UMHSBATCH_SUBDEPARTMENT as select ID as [VALUE] ,NAME as [LABEL] from dbo.USR_UMHS_SUBDEPARTMENT order by NAME
